Welcome, and congratulations on joining our community of entrepreneurs!

The Dynamite Circle exists to help entrepreneurs connect and grow ambitious lifestyle businesses - so let‚Äôs get you started.

This email is a crash course on taking advantage of your membership.

There‚Äôs a lot of info, but please don‚Äôt be overwhelmed. Our team is here to help if you have any questions. The information is also all gathered here in [The DC Quick Start Guide](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9._X19zPWJvdzR4dXZ3ZmZscHpmamc1NG8zJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZHJpcCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1XZWxjb21lJTIxK1lvdXIrJUUyJTgwJTk4R2V0K1N0YXJ0ZWQrR3VpZGUlRTIlODAlOTkrdG8rdGhlK0R5bmFtaXRlK0NpcmNsZSJ9.2Ian0ji_MOVfEunQLVpa97NilwB5PTAWhkG3Q4lAqe4).

ü§ô¬†JOIN A "[COMMUNITY WELCOME CALL](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhdWQiOiJkZXRvdXIiLCJpc3MiOiJtb25vbGl0aCIsInN1YiI6ImRldG91cl9saW5rIiwiaWF0IjoxNzIwNDkyNjEzLCJuYmYiOjE3MjA0OTI2MTMsImFjY291bnRfaWQiOiIyMjk5NDI1IiwiZGVsaXZlcnlfaWQiOiJtdmRvcjJ1dWxsbTVpYTdiZ2Y3YyIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vY2FsZW5kbHkuY29tL2FsZXhoYXJsaW5nL2RjLWdyb3VwLW9uYm9hcmRpbmc_X19zPWJvdzR4dXZ3ZmZscHpmamc1NG8zJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZHJpcCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1XZWxjb21lJTIxK1lvdXIrJUUyJTgwJTk4R2V0K1N0YXJ0ZWQrR3VpZGUlRTIlODAlOTkrdG8rdGhlK0R5bmFtaXRlK0NpcmNsZSJ9.aU5PLk6wu9-yvVT8bmgsB1HGdkJWR7YzxPWRUPEEX0A)"

Once a month, our team leads a group phone call to welcome new members to the community.

We get to know each other and discuss the best ways to connect with other members. We will also highlight key elements of the community and how you can get the most out of them.

Whether you‚Äôve just joined the DC, or have been around for a while and would like to share your experience with new members, join us for a discussion about the community.

Join a [Community Welcome Call](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhdWQiOiJkZXRvdXIiLCJpc3MiOiJtb25vbGl0aCIsInN1YiI6ImRldG91cl9saW5rIiwiaWF0IjoxNzIwNDkyNjEzLCJuYmYiOjE3MjA0OTI2MTMsImFjY291bnRfaWQiOiIyMjk5NDI1IiwiZGVsaXZlcnlfaWQiOiJtdmRvcjJ1dWxsbTVpYTdiZ2Y3YyIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vY2FsZW5kbHkuY29tL2FsZXhoYXJsaW5nL2RjLWdyb3VwLW9uYm9hcmRpbmc_X19zPWJvdzR4dXZ3ZmZscHpmamc1NG8zJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZHJpcCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1XZWxjb21lJTIxK1lvdXIrJUUyJTgwJTk4R2V0K1N0YXJ0ZWQrR3VpZGUlRTIlODAlOTkrdG8rdGhlK0R5bmFtaXRlK0NpcmNsZSJ9.aU5PLk6wu9-yvVT8bmgsB1HGdkJWR7YzxPWRUPEEX0A).

Alex shows you some of the most helpful forum features and how to connect with members. Also, if you have questions, reach out to [Alex](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..vakN1W-UYqzyNqdqgQsFbr4LKT9CUV9GK1ugT8qg6Xw) anytime. ¬†
üìï¬†READ OUR [COMMUNITY GUIDELINES](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..kDERyf1rkPZ0oXdrsngUvAEyfSRxyslRECruVp-3j0U)

Since 2011, the DC has helped thousands of entrepreneurs through its many facets, sticking to its values and holding its members to the same standard. To become a supportive member of the community, read our [Community Guidelines](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..kDERyf1rkPZ0oXdrsngUvAEyfSRxyslRECruVp-3j0U).
These guidelines will help you thrive in the community and pay dividends in the relationships you cultivate here.

Note: Any self-promotion and offensive behavior is not tolerated.¬†
¬†
ü§ù EVENTS AND CONNECT IN-PERSON

Find our in-person Event Schedule [here](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..iv_CFULriA9usA5cSmoCjSI7sk9d2MjyJ2Nd21q9QeM).
You'll find major events and local meet-ups happening around the world.¬†

Join the [DC WhatsApp Groups](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9._X19zPWJvdzR4dXZ3ZmZscHpmamc1NG8zJnV0bV9zb3VyY2U9ZHJpcCZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtPWVtYWlsJnV0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1XZWxjb21lJTIxK1lvdXIrJUUyJTgwJTk4R2V0K1N0YXJ0ZWQrR3VpZGUlRTIlODAlOTkrdG8rdGhlK0R5bmFtaXRlK0NpcmNsZSNnaWQ9MCJ9.FRkevid30dyx2Xay6H9GyJpvBuiBlpHg0qwjtJaCp7U).
This is where members often organize meet-ups. Find your city, join a group and introduce yourself! Other DCers will reply and help you organize a meet-up.

Add your Location and Travel plans on the [DC Locator](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..wosL4SYmIfibTRRYNBVOxlLsIaz2YO-N960iXmb4WtE).
Want to quickly connect with members in your area? Find them in the DC Locator and send them a message! You can also add your travel plans to see members in the cities you'll be visiting. ¬†
¬†

SUBSCRIBE TO THE DC CALENDAR

Here we list details of events, Coffee Calls, Group Onboarding, amd more. You can easily toggle this on and off once added, so you don‚Äôt miss out on upcoming happenings.

Subscribe to the [DC Calendar](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhdWQiOiJkZXRvdXIiLCJpc3MiOiJtb25vbGl0aCIsInN1YiI6ImRldG91cl9saW5rIiwiaWF0IjoxNzIwNDkyNjEzLCJuYmYiOjE3MjA0OTI2MTMsImFjY291bnRfaWQiOiIyMjk5NDI1IiwiZGVsaXZlcnlfaWQiOiJtdmRvcjJ1dWxsbTVpYTdiZ2Y3YyIsInVybCI6Imh0dHBzOi8vY2FsZW5kYXIuZ29vZ2xlLmNvbS9jYWxlbmRhci91LzA_.Xww6EK2Bklr4ZcK1WhDLkzV9GmiO81xQfx64kGDzxro)

üë©‚Äçüíª CONNECT ONLINE

Post in the [Forum](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..7BVHIYN-VYbH1geVecPwUekKzW-vzXZhh7KrVOpyd4c)
I recommend posting an intro about yourself, your business, and the types of members you'd like to meet. Just make sure not to be pitchy or promotional!

Find members through the [DC Connector](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..BiQpPyp9jUcwJ8cZMRyVCd9y9nFaNA3wPYv9iP5Gqvg).
With the help of AI, you're able to add queries that will help you find members you're interested in connecting with. Whether you want to connect with SaaS founders, new parents, or tennis players, you can ask the Connector and it will give you a list of DCers to talk to. You can also find a list of recently active members and new DCers in a separate tab.
¬†
üß† JOIN A MASTERMIND GROUP

Each year, we host a ‚ÄòMastermind Rush‚Äô when new masterminds are formed. The Rush usually occurs in Q1. Before the Rush happens, it will be announced to the community and you‚Äôll see it in the forum. These masterminds are member-led and the groups are created based on business size and industry.¬†

If there‚Äôs no Rush happening, you can still join a mastermind group by registering for the [waitlist](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..uZk1_h6YZlpU0_ips-pYOc2Thw_df8N_y2pMxSpNqGs).
Please remember that finding the group takes time and it could a few weeks or over a month to be placed. We do our best to make sure members are properly matched.

Are you a 7 or 8-figure founder who wants to be grouped with members at the same
level and above?
[DC Black](https://t.dripemail2.com/c/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..og78rZ_iM8P0bzb77XL3-qYecMgNFIbd9IuOyxUsL7Q) is a community of the DC that offers monthly, facilitated masterminds for high growth founders.
